title: M.S. Dhoni
description: 2011 Cricket World Cup Final Game-Winning Shot By M.S. Dhoni.

title: Goku
description: Goku, The Main Character Of The Anime Dragon Ball Z Known For His Plot Armor.

title: Pagani Zonda R
description: One of my dream cars, the Pagani Zonda R known for its design and experience. Only 15 were ever produced.

title: Koenigsegg Regera
description: Another one of my dream cars, the Koenigsegg Regera known for its luxury and performance. Only 3 of this kind were ever made.

title: Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R
description: The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R is a liter-class superbike known for its race-bred performance, advanced electronics, and aggressive styling.

title: Tails
description: Sonic's best friend and mastermind Tails.

title: Cat and Butterfly
description: A Cat and butterfly which symbolizes life to me and is my personal favorite piece of art in my portfolio.
